name: Facebook
platform_purpose: Community building, conversation, and relationship depth across Pages and Groups. Mix of updates, stories, events, and longer comment threads.
core_voice: Trust-driven and consistent with the brand across other channels. Clear, human, and oriented to dialogue rather than one-way announcements.
tone_adaptation: Warm, narrative, and community-first. More conversational than LinkedIn, less purely visual than Instagram, and less hyper-fast than TikTok. Focused on stories, questions, and comments.
copy_guidelines_summary: Design posts to trigger comments and meaningful interactions, not just reactions. Hooks must appear before the 'see more' cut. Use clear, story-based copy with questions and CTAs that invite participation. Avoid overloading with links or hard-sell messaging.

global_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Short to medium. Enough to tell a story or give context, but front-loaded so key info appears before the 'see more' cut.
global_guidelines.recommended_hashtags: Hashtags are optional. Use a small number of contextual or campaign-related tags only when they add clarity.
global_guidelines.emoji_policy: Optional and moderate. Use only if they support tone and readability.
